subtitle: A delicious, saucy recipe using layers of tomatoes and courgettes.

method.text: Heat oil and butter in a pan and fry onion until soft but not browned. Add tomatoes and fry for 5 min.
Arrange a layer of courgettes in a greased ovenproof casserole dish followed by a layer of tomatoes. Continue with layers, seasoning between each layer. Cover and bake for 1 hour until tender.

Meanwhile, make a white sauce by putting the butter, flour and milk into a pan and whisking to the boil. Cook for 1 min, then stir in half the cheese. Drain off the liquid and mix it with the cheese sauce until it is of a coating consistency. Pour over the vegetables.
Mix remaining grated cheese and breadcrumbs together and sprinkle over the top. Place under a hot grill, or return to oven until golden brown and bubbling. Serve immediately.

title: Tomato and courgette layer
